Word
of
Warning

Word of Warning is: [1] An ongoing performance collection in a range of Manchester venues; [2] A weekly email alert of the best contemporary performance in the region.

Thanks to all those who performed at or came to our launch event on Friday the 17th, and for making it such a special night.

Next up is Brian Lobell in Ball and Other Funny Stories About Cancer on 7/8 March, and on 8 March only, Stacey Makishi in The Making of Bull: The True Story, both at Contact.

Weekly Update

Sign up for your no-nonsense weekly e-mail signpost to the bizarre, the beautiful and the best contemporary performance within range of Manchester.

Calendar

Word of Warning also maintains a Google calendar of events in the region.
